original_title: O Rap do Pequeno Príncipe Contra as Almas Sebosas
overview: A documentary that focuses on two young male inhabitants of Recife (statistically, the fourth worst city in the world to live in) who have both reacted strongly to their situation. One has become a drummer in a rap/rock band. The other has killed forty-four people and is now in jail. Both use the term "Wicked Souls" to describe their enemies.
title: The Little Prince's Rap Against The Wicked Souls
